  • java.lang.Object

  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the whole project

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void generateRunner(java.lang.String file)
      This method takes feature file name and generates runner class for the same, runner template is stored in a string variable for later appending in the runner class file

      This method generates the step file, also got the template declared as string variable
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is the entry point of the project

      This method is for compiling java class and running the generated class file and returns the console output as InputStream to the Caller function
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchFeatureFiles(java.io.File fileDir)
      This method search the current directory for all .feature files and store the name in a list of string and returns the same

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This is the entry point of the project
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments (here no need to pass any)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IO exception when unable to scan the directory.

      • generateRunner

        public static void generateRunner(java.lang.String file)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes feature file name and generates runner class for the same, runner template is stored in a string variable for later appending in the runner class file
        Parameters:
        file - Feature file name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Unable to create runner java file exception.

      • generateStepFile

        public static void generateStepFile(java.lang.String stepFileName)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method generates the step file, also got the template declared as string variable
        Parameters:
        stepFileName - Step file name (clipped from feature file name)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception for unable to create step java file.

      • runRunnerClass

        public static java.io.InputStream runRunnerClass(java.lang.String runner)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method is for compiling java class and running the generated class file and returns the console output as InputStream to the Caller function
        Parameters:
        runner - Runner class name
        Returns:
        Returns input stream of exec() command
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO exception for Runtime process.

      • searchFeatureFiles

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchFeatureFiles(java.io.File fileDir)
        This method search the current directory for all .feature files and store the name in a list of string and returns the same
        Parameters:
        fileDir - Directory path [will be the dir where this jar is]
        Returns:
        This returns list feature file names as string
